name: 3D Sound Alpha
description:
Instructions

1. Put some headphones on.

2. Click on the image then use arrow keys or WASD keys to move around, and the mouse to look around.

Notes

This is not a game. The columns are speakers playing left and right audio signals.

As you move between the two pairs to mix and fade the two tracks.

Warning!

I haven't worked out how to escape from the 'game' yet. It is an alpha after all :-)
